channel.title: Defenders (dragon dagger (+)s that r like perfect rings
channel.description: How do i make Defenders (dragon dagger (+)s that r like perfect rings that u wear in ur shield spot)??? how do i make it so admins have to type ::defender to get 1? how do i make it a admin/mod only item? how do i make it like a perfect ring? please help me.

item.title: Defenders (dragon dagger (+)s that r like perfect rings
item.dc:creator: @Pilldom Pilldom
item.description:
@Pilldom wrote:

the cammond part you have but its way to hard to explain the rest… You need to look around in the tutorial section for one. They have how to make commands like that. Also you could have looked in your source and just changed the command to the right id. Also adding dffenders would be client side, because it requires no models that dont come with standered chaches.

Read full topic
item.source: Defenders (dragon dagger (+)s that r like perfect rings

item.title: Defenders (dragon dagger (+)s that r like perfect rings
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

dragon dagger (+) as defender is in item.java, put the code under shield, and in item.cfg you can make the strength bonus like 999999 so it 1 hits people, and the ::defender is easy, but i dont got the time to help you out srry

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

For The Command :

if (command.startsWith("defender") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(ITEM ##, 1); }

Open Item.java
Ctrl + F

public static int shields[] =

Then Add The IDs Under…

Dunno About The Other…
